About Michael Davis


Whether buying or selling, you want a strong negotiator in your corner to make sure you get the best price: For sellers, that means, the most money in your pocket in the shortest time with the least inconvenience to you. For buyers, that means a market savvy agent with hundreds of real estate transactions under their belt. I’ve successfully negotiated sales from $40,000 to $20,000,000 and everything in between. I negotiated short sales successfully directly with lenders before there were attorney led companies doing this for agents. And ask anyone in the business, these are some of the toughest transactions to get to close and I have successfully closed nearly 100 of them. I’ve managed successful real estate related businesses and spent 6 years negotiating deals in the commercial real estate world with the pros. When experience in negotiating your deal matters most, call on an expert to handle your most valuable and important investment: your home.

Michael Davis
The Davis Home Team
Coldwell Banker Residential Brokerage
